alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:02PM MST until December 28 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts benches and Wasatch Back. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Southwest Wyoming. In Utah, Cache Valley/Utah Portion, Eastern Box Elder County, Wasatch Back and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Through 4 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Expect winter driving conditions and potential traction/chain restrictions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
